name: Reflections (itch) (plackett)
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move, E to interact with atlases.

Set in an underwater area, you traverse the light puzzles presented to you in order to make your way to whatever lies at the end, requiring many deaths along the way. Created for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

Source Code is available online at https://github.com/Plackett/Reflections/tree/main .
